sect1.title: #WEBSERVICE

row.entry: The FIELDS parameter specifies field sequence field sequence in WsECL Web forms. This is an exclusive list. If the FIELDS attribute is present, only the fields in the fieldslist are displayed on the Web form in WsECL.
A comma-separated list of field names in the order in which they should appear on the form.
The HELP Parameter specifies to add help text to the WsECL Web form.
The DESCRIPTION Parameter specifies to add descriptive text to the WsECL Web form.

sect1.para: The #WEBSERVICEstatement sets options for the input parameters on a WsECL Web form for a published query.
